001package org.nasdanika.ncore.gen;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.io.InputStream;
005
006import org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.AdapterImpl;
007import org.nasdanika.common.Context;
008import org.nasdanika.common.ExecutionException;
009import org.nasdanika.common.ProgressMonitor;
010import org.nasdanika.common.Supplier;
011import org.nasdanika.common.SupplierFactory;
012import org.nasdanika.common.Util;
013
014/**
015 * For Ncore String.
016 * @author Pavel
017 *
018 */
019public class StringSupplierFactoryAdapter extends AdapterImpl implements SupplierFactory<InputStream> {
020
021        public StringSupplierFactoryAdapter(org.nasdanika.ncore.String string) {
022                setTarget(string);
023        }
024        
025        @Override
026        public boolean isAdapterForType(Object type) {
027                return type == SupplierFactory.class;
028        }
029
030        @Override
031        public Supplier<InputStream> create(Context context) {
032                return new Supplier<InputStream>() {
033                        
034                        @Override
035                        public double size() {
036                                return 1;
037                        }
038        
039                        @Override
040                        public String name() {
041                                return "Ncore String";
042                        }
043        
044                        @Override
045                        public InputStream execute(ProgressMonitor progressMonitor) {
046                                org.nasdanika.ncore.String target = (org.nasdanika.ncore.String) getTarget();
047                                String text = target.getValue();
048                                try {
049                                        return Util.toStream(context, text);
050                                } catch (IOException e) {
051                                        throw new ExecutionException(e, this);
052                                }
053                        }
054                
055                };
056                
057        }
058
059}
